name: Why there?
description:
"Why There?" is a tiny walking (swimming?) simulator which lasts roughly one minute.

This is an entry to the One Minute Game Jam 7, with the goal of making a game around 1 minute long.
The game is simple and only requires one input in addition to movement.

CONTROLS

ActionMouse/KeyboardGamepad (XBX)MovementWASDLeft ThumbstickLookMouseRight ThumbstickDiveLeft Mouse ButtonB

CREDITS

The game uses the following (purchased/free) assets:

  • 3D assets from Synty Studio's "POLYGON War" & "POLYGON Nature" packages.
  • VFX from Archanor VFX's "Polygon Arsenal" package.
  • Audio from Sidearm Studios' "Ultimate Sound FX Bundle" package.
  • Tweening functions from DemiGiant's "DOTween Pro" package.
